name: Seed Bash!
description:
A local multiplayer arena fighting game. 

Its about angry bashing seeds!

They fight for the perfect sprouting place!

Up to four local players with gamepad support.

Have fun, bugs included :3

We will drop the game for free on steam after the jam!

It was made in 6 days during Global Game Jam 2023

Credits

Art - Michael Kaiser

Development - Dominik Geuer aka Piontek & Daniel Otto

Sounds & Music - freesounds will add creators later

Info

Diversifiers: Couch Potato

Platforms: Windows

Tools: Unreal Engine

GameTags:

  • 3D
  • Action
  • Arcade
  • Casual
  • Top-Down
